alert.note: Alert for Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 14 at 5:59AM CDT until May 15 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...CRITICAL FIRE WEATHER CONDITIONS POSSIBLE MONDAY... Dry conditions are forecast Monday with gusty winds. Westerly winds of 8 to 15 mph with gusts to 20 mph. Some areas may see a few gusts to 25 mph in the afternoon. A Red Flag Warning may be needed. ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY MORNING THROUGH MONDAY EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR PORTIONS OF NORTHEAST MINNESOTA... * AFFECTED AREA...In Minnesota, Koochiching, North St. Louis, Northern Cook and Lake, North Itasca and Central St. Louis. * WINDS...West 10 to 15 mph with gusts up to 25 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 16 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 70s to middle 80s * IMPACTS...Any fires may grow and spread quickly.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Central St. Louis; Koochiching; North Itasca; North St. Louis; Northern Cook, Northern Lake
